original_title: 2005 Chicago White Sox: The Official World Series Film
overview: The 2005 Chicago White Sox finally put it all together in the same season-incredible pitching, timely hitting, superb management and an unselfish, all-around team effort and finally the second longest championship drought in baseball history (88 years) comes to an end with a bold exclamation point at the end of a dramatic sweep of the Houston Astros to clinch that elusive World Series trophy.
title: 2005 Chicago White Sox: The Official World Series Film
